header.name: chaos/preprocessor/slot/counter.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines macros used generate numbers that are unique within a translation unit.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to the current counter value.
macro.para: This macro expands to an integer literal. Its initial value defaults to 0. This initial value (per translation unit) can be overridden by defining . Each usage of increases the current value by one. Between usages of , the value of is constant.

macro.abstract: The macro increments the current counter value.
The macro is defines the initial value (in a translation unit) of .

usage.param: The integer literal to be used as the initial value of .

macro.para: If defined by the user, this macro must be defined prior to including any library headers. If it is not defined by the user, it defaults to 0.
This macro can be defined on the command line such that unique numbers can be generated across multiple translation units.
